comments.author: Angry_Kitty
comments.body: Fall of the market is a best time to buy tokens for the best price. And private sale allows to have the best price. How do you plan to promote the project?

comments.author: Binity
comments.body: Quote from: Angry_Kitty on February 25, 2023, 09:39:01 AMFall of the market is a best time to buy tokens for the best price. And private sale allows to have the best price. How do you plan to promote the project?A lot of depends what is the minimum deposit for private sale. Usualy private sale is available only for big investors. It is necessary to remember that after the fall of the market will be a rise and it is necessary to buy the tokens during the fall of the market to have the best price.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Am sorry for my following harsh words but allow me to share my first warm impressions after reading opening post.Here we go again with the old scheme of the tokenized gold scams .For the ones eventually still not familiar with them here's broadly how they work : a tokenized gold scam typically involves a fraudulent investment scheme that promises high returns on investments in gold that has been "tokenized" or digitized. The scammers may use a variety of tactics to convince victims to invest in their scheme, such as using slick marketing materials or making exaggerated claims about the potential returns. Once victims have invested in the scheme, the scammers may use a variety of tactics to delay or prevent them from accessing their funds, such as claiming that there are technical difficulties with the platform or that the investment needs to mature before it can be cashed out.In many cases, the scammers do not actually invest the funds in gold, but instead use them to pay off earlier investors or for their own personal gain. Basically yet another dress for the good old Ponzi scam.Generally speaking always stick to the "too good to be true" ruleÂ  and to do thorough research before investing in any new opportunity.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: hopenotlate on February 28, 2023, 10:10:05 AMAm sorry for my following harsh words but allow me to share my first warm impressions after reading opening post.Here we go again with the old scheme of the tokenized gold scams .It's not really that harsh because its the truth when I'm just starting out 4 or 5 years there is a lot of gold based token that turns out to be Ponzi schemeQuoteFor the ones eventually still not familiar with them here's broadly how they work : a tokenized gold scam typically involves a fraudulent investment scheme that promises high returns on investments in gold that has been "tokenized" or digitized. The scammers may use a variety of tactics to convince victims to invest in their scheme, such as using slick marketing materials or making exaggerated claims about the potential returns. Once victims have invested in the scheme, the scammers may use a variety of tactics to delay or prevent them from accessing their funds, such as claiming that there are technical difficulties with the platform or that the investment needs to mature before it can be cashed out.In many cases, the scammers do not actually invest the funds in gold, but instead use them to pay off earlier investors or for their own personal gain. Basically yet another dress for the good old Ponzi scam.You sum it all up I invested in one I forgot the name they used gold as collateral to make their projects look good in the eyes of investors, they even used all kinds of hype like a bounty campaign if you notice here there are many newbies and junior members here who shill and hype this type of project but for old members, they know that this is another Ponzi scheme in the making, so investors should be aware of this scheme.I have a feeling that these are bunch of paid shills to hype this project, its so easy to tell.

comments.author: Artik_Finance
comments.body: The problem with all tokenized assets is that users are not sure that these assets are actually tokenized. Therefore, the main task of the project administration is to convince investors that in fact all assets are secured.

comments.author: Megladoge
comments.body: Quote from: Artik_Finance on February 28, 2023, 02:23:40 PMThe problem with all tokenized assets is that users are not sure that these assets are actually tokenized. Therefore, the main task of the project administration is to convince investors that in fact all assets are secured.In order for people to make sure that the cryptocurrency is actually secured with real material values, there are reports from independent auditors to raise the confidence of investors and users in this cryptocurrency.

comments.author: i8v8i
comments.body: Quote from: Megladoge on February 28, 2023, 03:02:44 PMQuote from: Artik_Finance on February 28, 2023, 02:23:40 PMThe problem with all tokenized assets is that users are not sure that these assets are actually tokenized. Therefore, the main task of the project administration is to convince investors that in fact all assets are secured.In order for people to make sure that the cryptocurrency is actually secured with real material values, there are reports from independent auditors to raise the confidence of investors and users in this cryptocurrency.Despite the large number of scandals and the lack of proven collateral, Tether remains the most popular stablecoin, as the need for stablecoins remains high, especially during the fall of the cryptocurrency market.

comments.author: romanfrolovv
comments.body: Quote from: cryptosru on March 02, 2023, 08:55:49 AMDuring the fall of the market the demand in stable coins and stable assets is very high. Gold is a real value and the demand in the tokenized assets continue to be very high.Many people are waiting till the rise of the market but when the market falls people needs stability that is why the demand in stable coins and stable assets that are backed by such values like gold is very high.
